item.description:
The Living Room (www.thelivingroomboston.com) should be a comfortable place for Sunday brunch. It's located on the other side of Christopher Columbus Park from the Long Wharf Marriott Hotel, at the corner of Atlantic Ave. and Richmond St. The Aquarium T-stop is right nearby. We'll mingle over Bloody Marys and Mimosas from 12:45-1:30, then order brunch. Brunch entrees run from $7-12. This will be our second meet 'n' greet. Then we'll start having sit-down dinners. After brunch, we'll walk to a North End cafe for coffee and dessert.

The cut-off for this event will be Friday, May 1st at 5:00 PM, as I will not see e-mail on Saturday. Check the "About" tab for further guidelines. Hope you can make it.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be in the Dining Room-Ask hostess for our table.
item.name: The Living Room-Sunday Brunch
